subject: Gymnastics
lead_paragraph: The United States women set themselves up as the team to beat at the world championships — and maybe next year in Beijing, too — with a razor-sharp and nearly mistake-free romp in qualifying yesterday in Stuttgart, Germany. They scored 245.025 points to take a 3.85-point lead over China.
